duties_responsibilities.duty: Corroborate patient’s clinical history with procedure, assuring information is documented and available for use by radiologist.
Prepare patients for MRI procedure and ensure their safety in the MRI environment.
Operate and perform MRI examinations using appropriate equipment and procedures.
Evaluate images and data for technical quality and maintain patient logbooks.
Maintain MRI systems, perform venipuncture, and ensure aseptic technique.
Assist in clerical duties, participate in quality assessment, and pursue continuing education.

education_certification.credential: Technical School/2 Years College/Associate’s Degree (Bachelor's Degree Preferred)
MRI Certification within 1 year of hire
